data: Oh, it's you... the new alchemist, right?{break}{mood:like}You're cuter than I thought you'd be.{break}{mood:laugh}I was imagining some old guy with a beard.

{mood:happy}I'm so psyched about this date!{break}{mood:like}I know I can be pretty flirty, but I get SO shy about actually asking people out.{break}So, I'm glad you took the initiative.{break}{mood:happy}Especially because you're CUTE. And new. That helps too.{break}{mood:like}I've been looking forward to this all day.{break}What should we do?
{mood:laugh}Ha, no way! I swear I was JUST about to ask you out.{break}{mood:happy}Well, I guess that works out perfectly, then.{break}Let's do 20:00!
{mood:sad}I'm busy that night, cutie. Maybe another time.
Ehhhhh, I'm bored of going there.{break}Let's go somewhere else. Any suggestions?

{mood:happy}You absolutely read my mind.{break}I love digging big holes! I think there's something primal about it.{break}{mood:laugh}We just need to be careful not to dig all the way down... we'll fall out the bottom!{break}{mood:like}Okay, let's go find a good spot to dig...{break}{mood:happy}Come on, I'll race you!

{mood:laugh}You're such a flirt. Wow!{break}{mood:like}Maybe on the next date, yeah?{break}{mood:happy}Let's get to know each other better first!{break}{mood:like}I know that I'm a big flirt, but I actually like to take things slow.{break}{mood:like}How about we just walk down the beach for a bit?{break}{mood:happy}Come on, I'll race you!
{mood:dislike}Uh... I think it's a bit soon for that.{break}I'm no prude, but I prefer to know someone better first.{break}{mood:default}Let's just go for a walk instead...
{mood:happy}A gift!! Thank you.{break}And I had just run out of these. Thanks!

*inhale*{break}*exhale*{break}{mood:like}Smell that sea air. It's so refreshing.{break}{mood:sad}I wonder what it was like before the cataclysm. Just... sea as far as you can see.{break}We must have lost so much when it happened. I can't even imagine...
{mood:awkward}Ahhhh no! Nooo no no no!{break}Ugh, ew, ew ew ew.{break}Please don't give me this again!{break}I don't like round stuff... blehhh.
We're lucky. It's still so beautiful.
{mood:awkward}AHHH IT'S SO ROUND! I HATE IT!{break}PLEASE DON'T MAKE ME HOLD IT!{break}I'M GOING TO THROW THIS IN THE OCEAN AS SOON AS YOU LEAVE
{mood:angry}You stood me up, jerk!{break}{mood:dislike}I'll forgive you, but only because you're cute.
I love to watch you leave. Because of your butt.{random}NICE BUUUUTT{random}Love you, sexy.

...I suppose that's true.{break}I mean, we're lucky that part of the world survived...{break}{mood:love}And we're lucky that we're here to see it, too.{break}{npc:down}I guess it's hard to know how lucky you are without a point of comparison.{break}But you're right. It's beautiful. Especially with you.{break}{mood:laugh}Okay, enough mushy stuff!{break}{mood:happy}Let's head back into town. I'm getting cold.

I can't even imagine it!{break}I wonder if they even appreciated what they had.{break}Being able to climb mountains, swim in lakes...{break}{mood:laugh}I guess we have *A* mountain and *A* lake. I don't want to take THEM for granted, either!{break}{mood:like}You know, that's more important than regretting what I don't have, isn't it?{break}Appreciating what we DO have.{break}{mood:happy}Like, each other!{break}{mood:happy}Now, do you wanna walk me back home? I'm COLD.
Wow, it's that easy to get forgiven?

{mood:dislike}They had both, though!{break}Sure, they weren't as high up, but they had so much...{break}{mood:sad}And they just took it all for granted.{break}Sorry, I... I have to go.{break}This stuff always makes me so sad.
{mood:dislike}Don't do it again.{break}Or I'll date your favourite Spirit as revenge.

You know, I've always wanted to bring a metal detector to a beach.{break}{mood:happy}It sounds so fun! And you might get rich!{break}Cleo tells me about stuff she finds, sometimes.{break}But without context, it's hard to know what some of it is. Or... was.{break}{mood:sad}We lost so much of our history when the cataclysm happened...
{mood:happy}Guess what! It's my biiiirthdayyyyy!!{break}I'm gonna make Ossono bake me a cake.
{mood:happy}Is this a birthday gift? You charmer!{break}{mood:love}It means all the more because it came from YOU.
We can make sure it never happens again.
You know I'm an ALCHEMIST, not an archaeologist?
Do you need any new tools?{break}{mood:happy}Let me know. I'm bored.

{mood:love}Okay, that's REALLY cute.{break}"Make our own history". You're so cute.{break}{mood:happy}Page one: That time we stayed at the beach until the stars came out...{break}Page two: That time we held hands while the tide came in...{break}Page three: When you kissed me under a full moon...{break}{mood:laugh}Not tonight, though. It's a work night! Also, not a full moon!{break}{mood:happy}Come on, let's head back.{break}{mood:love}Page zero: A kiss at the door after a beach date...

We can do what we can. The cataclysm already happened.{break}{mood:like}But we can preserve what we have for future generations!{break}{mood:love}I mean... If we have future generations... Not that I meant... um...{break}{mood:laugh}You make me so nervous when you look at me like that!{break}{mood:love}Can you walk me home?
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
{mood:sad}It's so cold today! Even inside. Brrr.{break}{mood:happy}Wanna cuddle for warmth?

{mood:dislike}Yes, I know that!{break}{mood:default}Everyone needs hobbies outside of their jobs.{break}I'm not blacksmithing right now either, am I?{break}...Maybe I should be.{break}I have some commissions to finish off, anyway.{break}Bye.
Will you be my hot buff girlfriend?

...I just had this weird flashback.{break}{npc:up}When I was a little girl, I came here with my dad.{break}{mood:like}We built a sandcastle. I put all my effort into it... it was amazing.{break}{npc:down}{mood:default}But the tide came in, and washed it away before we left.{break}{mood:laugh}{npc:left}I cried so much that my dad ended up taking me to the tavern for ice cream.{break}{mood:sad}But when I think of that day... it still makes me feel so sad.{break}I don't know why.
You're afraid of losing things you love.
{mood:happy}A million billion times yes!{break}I'm gonna go tell everyone!!!
It's sad to see your creative effort destroyed.
{mood:dislike}Dude, what gives?{break}{mood:angry}That's a real jerk move.
{mood:like}It's my favourite alchemist!{break}{mood:happy}Am I your favourite blacksmith?

{mood:laugh}Oh, wow. That's so serious!{break}{mood:default}Maybe you're right, though. Everything dies. That's scary.{break}Maybe that was the first moment I faced my own mortality.{break}Honestly... I'm pretty scared of death.{break}{mood:laugh}I know, who isn't, right?{break}{mood:default}But the thought of leaving nothing behind some day... that's scary.{break}{mood:laugh}Haha, sorry. Sometimes I go on a bit of a downer.{break}{mood:like}Come on, let's go back inside where it's warm.
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
Do you like my outfit today?{break}{mood:dislike}What do you mean it's the same as yesterday?

Yeah, maybe.{break}{mood:sad}I'd be heartbroken if my blacksmithing works were destroyed.{break}{mood:default}But I guess one day, they will be gone, just like me, right?{break}{mood:sad}I don't like thinking about it.{break}I just feel like... like a little blip in the universe that no one even notices.{break}{mood:laugh}Blerrrrgh, sorry. What a downer I am today!{break}{mood:like}Come on, let's go for a walk before we end the date.{break}{mood:happy}I promise I'll talk about funner stuff.
{mood:sad}I'm not really ready to make that kind of commitment right now.{break}I'm sorry, cutie.
{mood:dislike}I could take the day off... but I have orders to fulfil.
{mood:dislike}Mean.{break}Well, maybe a bit true. But still mean.{break}{mood:default}We should head home. It's getting dark.
Bleep blorp, sneep snorp.{break}{mood:happy}I'm doing vocal exercises.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet
{mood:awkward}Have you been fishing? You smell like you've been fishing.{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry!
{mood:sad}Does this mean you want to break up?
{mood:dislike}The day is going by soooo slowly today.{break}{mood:like}It's better for seeing you, though!

Well, I wanted to be a blacksmith because it seemed so COOL.{break}{mood:happy}Hammers! Fire! Metal! Getting really buff!{break}{mood:like}Plus, I won't lie... It helps identify people that aren't jerks.{break}{mood:laugh}The jerks assume they're stronger than me. Because of the way I look.{break}{mood:happy}I usually prove them wrong pretty quickly. POW.
I'm so sleepy.{break}{mood:happy}No, wait... hungry. I'm hungry.
{mood:sad}You want to... break up?{break}...{break}Was it something I did...?{break}...I think I need some time alone.
I bet I'm stronger than you.

{mood:dislike}You jerk, how hard can it be to NOT give your girlfriend the one thing that means you want to break up?{break}...{break}{mood:default}Whatever, I'm not mad at you really.{break}{mood:angry}Don't do it again! Ya goof!
Oh, I thought you were Gaiana.{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry!

{mood:happy}Haha! Thank you!{break}I mean, you're right. Why wouldn't you want a girlfriend who could crush you?{break}{mood:like}If you ask me, people who are intimidated by buff gals are just insecure.{break}{mood:dislike}And I don't date people who act like their insecurities are my fault.{break}{mood:like}For the record, though... my type is more...{break}Well, let's just say I like people who are good with their hands.{break}{mood:laugh}Okay, now forget I just said that!{break}{mood:laugh}Can you walk me home to make sure I don't fall off the edge of the island?
{mood:sad}I'm not looking forward to winter. I get sick all the time.

{mood:laugh}Maybe another time.{break}{mood:like}I'm three drinks in, babe.{break}It's not a fair competition.{break}{mood:happy}Maybe when we're both sober!{break}{mood:like}Just as long as you're aware that I will DESTROY you.{break}{mood:laugh}Tell you what, I'll let you get the next round instead! Off you go!

{mood:dislike}Come on, don't be like that.{break}Even as a joke.{break}Sure, maybe you ARE stronger than me.{break}But I'm tired of people taking my existence as a challenge to their ego.{break}So yeah. Don't be a jerk.{break}I think I'll just go home. Bye.

{mood:happy}FIREWORKS, BABY.{break}I made these ones this year.{break}{mood:laugh}I don't know if I'm cut out for explosives, but it sure is fun.{break}{mood:like}Plus, Zed helped. Well, Zed insisted he help, so I didn't blow myself up.{break}{mood:laugh}So, yeah! Enjoy!{break}{mood:like}Or better yet, hang out with me and watch them?
What's the best soup? Squish soup? Grumpkin soup?{break}{mood:happy}Trick question! All soup is good soup.

You know, you're really quiet.{break}{mood:laugh}Not that it's a bad thing! I can talk enough for both of us.{break}{mood:default}But... are you okay?{break}Are you always like this?{break}Or are you just quiet around me?
I'm still figuring out who to stand with!
You look so cold!{break}{mood:laugh}Do you not have sweaters where you're from?
{mood:happy}Awesoooome.{break}Everyone's gonna be so jealous of my arm candy... heheh.
You got any soup on you?{break}{mood:sad}I need souuuuup.
I'd talk more if you let me.
{mood:dislike}It's too windy today.{break}I can never keep the forge going in weather like this.

{mood:happy}Awww, you charmer!{break}Well, I hope that's not too much pressure, or I'll clam up!{break}{mood:like}I do like talking to you, though.{break}You don't say much, but you're always interesting.{break}{mood:happy}And it helps that you're not too bad to look at, either. Heh.{break}{mood:like}But seriously, don't be afraid to tell me to shut up if you need to.{break}{mood:happy}Anyway, it's getting late... Let's walk home before it's too dark!
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
Maybe I should cut my hair. Or dye it.{break}{mood:happy}OR BOTH.

{mood:happy}Fair enough! I'm used to everyone around me being an introvert.{break}{mood:like}I've just never met someone as quiet as you!{break}{mood:laugh}it makes me worry that I've done something wrong!{break}{mood:like}But I can learn to live with it.{break}{mood:happy}I need to head home now, but feel free to stay if you want another drink! It's on me!

{mood:happy}BEARDINIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII{break}LOOK AT HIM! SO FLUFFY??? AND HE'S MINE?{break}I'M SO HAPPY{break}THANK YOUUUUU!!!{break}{mood:like}Hey, I made you this as a thank you.{break}{mood:happy}It's a recipe for a better furnace! About time, huh?
{mood:love}Everyone looks more attractive in winter.{break}I can't handle a cutie in mittens!

{mood:awkward}Oh no, that's exactly what I was worried about...{break}Why didn't you say anything? I'm sorry!{break}{mood:sad}I'm just... I can't help being so chatty...{break}I like talking to you.{break}...I think I need to just... go home. I'm sorry.
{mood:sad}I'm so booooooored.{break}I want to go hoooome and have a baaaaaaath.

{mood:love}Heyyyy. *hic*{break}I've been here a while! I finished work earrrly.{break}I maybe have had a one or two drinks.{break}{mood:happy}I'm not drunk!!!!! But the world is all wiggly.{break}{mood:like}I jus... I jus gotta lie down.
{mood:happy}Hey, you did it! Thanks, babe.{break}{mood:like}Here's a little money for ya. I'm feeling generous!
{mood:dislike}It's so cold outside that my hair is actually frozen like this.
{mood:happy}I love a new year!{break}{mood:like}The promise of a whole new start.{break}{mood:happy}A fresh, clean slate. There's nothing like it!

{mood:love}You're sooo cute. SO CUTE.{break}I wanna just squish your cute face into my face.{break}{mood:happy}I like you so muuuuuuuuuch!!{break}{mood:like}Let's have a million babies and live forever.{break}{mood:happy}Okayyy let's go to my house!!! WOOoooo!!!!!
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met
{mood:dislike}Ugh. Summer. It's too hot.{break}Give me snow and hot chocolate, that's my jam.

{mood:happy}Yeahhh! I'm okay!{break}{mood:like}I just maybe forgot how much beer I could handle and Ossono didn't stop me.{break}{mood:dislike}She's a baaaad influence.{break}{mood:happy}But I'm having a great time and now YOU'RE here!!! I like you.{break}{mood:awkward}Oh. I think I'm gonna... need to go home. Very now. *blork*
{mood:happy}YES ABSOLUTELY OH MY GOD YES{break}{mood:like}I mean, wait, are you actually asking... what I think you're asking?
{mood:love}The leaves are SO gorgeous in fall.{break}{mood:happy}Aren't we lucky to live somewhere so beautiful?

{mood:awkward}Oh noooo no no no.{break}I'm so MESSYYY. I just wanted to be less nervous around you!{break}{mood:sad}And now I look like a stupid baby full of drool and beer.{break}Please forget you saw anything tonight because I like you and I don't want you to unlike me.{break}{mood:happy}Also can you please walk me home so I don't fall off the edge. Thank you please.
{mood:happy}Happy winter!{break}I hope you have someone to keep you warm on these cold nights...

So, I was chatting to Ofelia the other day.{break}{mood:laugh}She's sort of like a therapist-mom sometimes. She'd hate it if I called her that, though.{break}{mood:like}Anyway, I told her about how I keep freaking out about mortality.{break}And she says, get this...{break}{mood:dislike}"Life is worth something precisely BECAUSE it ends."{break}{mood:default}I don't know if I agree.{break}I mean, don't people dream of being immortal all the time?{break}What do you think?
{mood:happy}YES ABSOLUTELY OH MY GOD YES!!!!{break}COME HERE I'M GONNA SMOOCH YOU SO HARD
{mood:like}Happy new year, cutie pie.{break}{mood:happy}My plan this year is to cuddle you EVERY DAY.
Death makes room for more life.

Do you know how hard it is to get a date out here?{break}{mood:sad}The only people who ever visit are delivery people.{break}And occasionally researchers visiting Zed and Cleo.{break}{mood:laugh}Researchers are NOT my type.
We all have our time. Might as well face it willingly.
Oh, you know what?{break}{mood:happy}You should make sure to talk to Cleo more.{break}{mood:like}She knows EVERYTHING about these islands.{break}I bet she could help you on your alchemist mission!
I'm pretty sure I'm never gonna die.
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet

I don't suppose you're growing any Fire Flowers, are you?{break}{mood:sad}I've run out myself and the next delivery won't be for DAYS.{break}{mood:default}I use them to temper steel!{break}So if you have any spares... let me know.

Hmmmmm. I suppose I never thought of it like that.{break}Wanting to cling onto life is a bit selfish, isn't it?{break}We have to make way for someone else. SomeTHING else.{break}And we just have to make sure that what we leave behind makes it better for them.{break}{mood:like}Well, I hope when I die, I turn into stardust.{break}That way, I can watch it all happen after I'm gone.{break}{mood:happy}I hope you get to be stardust with me!

{mood:laugh}Hahaha, good one.{break}{mood:dislike}Wait, you're serious?{break}{mood:like}I understand that you want to lock this down, but I can't marry you! You don't even know my SECRETS yet.{break}{mood:happy}I'm enjoying our dates, but let's have a few more before we take that plunge, yeah?
It's nice to have new blood like you in town, you know.{break}{mood:happy}It spices things up.{break}Not to mention widening the dating pool, heheh.

I guess so.{break}{mood:laugh}It feels a bit like telling a kid to go to bed, though.{break}I mean, I don't WANT to go! I like it here!{break}{mood:default}Buuut you're right, as usual.{break}No point in being terrified of something inevitable.{break}{mood:like}So, here's to a dignified death.{break}A death that comes after a life well-lived.{break}{mood:happy}Cheers!
{mood:like}I love being in the hot spring when it's raining.{break}{mood:happy}Simple pleasures make my day.

...{break}{mood:laugh}Okay then.{break}{mood:like}I mean, that sounds like you're in denial.{break}{mood:default}I mean, I get it. But... you're not... special, you know?{break}I mean, you're SPECIAL, but not THAT special.{break}Maybe you should talk to Ofelia, too.{break}Come on, I'm tired. Let's pay the tab.

{mood:happy}Grats on locking that down, Alchemist! You made the second best choice on the island. WINK.{break}{mood:laugh}Just kidding. Hahahahaaaa. Wedding jokes. I don't get to make them often.{break}{mood:happy}By the way, my gift to you got "lost" in the "post". But it was totally cool and expensive and great.
Soooo... who do you have your eye on around here?{break}{mood:happy}Just wondering. You're a catch.
{mood:awkward}I saw a baby bird fall out of a nest this morning!{break}{mood:default}I picked him up and got him back in the nest.{break}I hope that was the right thing to do.
{mood:love}Hey, sexy. Let's blow this popsicle stand.{break}{mood:happy}I'd say "yours or mine" but they're the same place!

I just had an argument with Gaiana about brunch.{break}{mood:dislike}If you're eating at 9am, that's breakfast. Not brunch.{break}{mood:angry}Why do people call it brunch on the weekend? It's the same meal!

{mood:happy}I looooove the hot spring.{break}So toasty and floaty. This was a great idea for a date!{break}{mood:awkward}{npc:down}Oh! There's a little bug in the water! I think it's drowning!{break}{mood:dislike}Hold on, little bug! I'll save you!{break}{npc:up}{mood:happy}Hup! There you go! Dry off over there!
I heard that there's a Spirit out there that's shaped like a cup of coffee.{break}{mood:laugh}Nature is so weird.
I'm all out of tiny towels!
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
Hey, if you see Waldo out there...{break}...tell him "hi" from me.
I didn't know you liked bugs!
{mood:happy}Well, hello!{break}{mood:like}I was hoping you'd join me here some time.
{mood:happy}Yo, yo, yooooo!{break}I heard you closed the rift!? You're so cool and brave.{break}{mood:laugh}Honestly, I kinda forgot we *had* one. But I'm glad it's gone now!
{mood:love}Heyyyyyyyyyyyyy cutie.{break}{mood:like}I'm drink.{break}{mood:dislike}I mean, I'm dernk. Dornk?{break}{mood:like}Am tibsy. *hic*{break}{mood:happy}I had a lot of beerses.

{npc:left}{mood:laugh}Oh no!!{break}{mood:happy}I think he'll be okay without, though.{break}{mood:love}Thank you for not making fun of me.{break}{mood:like}I don't LOVE bugs... But I don't want them to suffer, you know?{break}I'm gonna get out now.{break}{mood:laugh}Don't step on the bug!!

{npc:left}{mood:laugh}Oh, I don't. They're scary.{break}{mood:like}But the little guys need our help sometimes.{break}And they're more scared of us, apparently.{break}{mood:happy}I can put my fear aside to help those less fortunate!{break}{mood:like}Are you ready to get out?{break}I'm getting a bit warm, so I think I'll head home.
{mood:happy}Seeing you is always the brightest part of my day, cutie!
{npc:left}{mood:dislike}I can't just sit there and let a bug drown when I can easily help.{break}He's helpless! And maybe he has a family!{break}...I'm going to get out and take him somewhere else.

{mood:happy}I have a plant request for you!{break}{mood:like}If you find any Erdenleaves, can I borrow some?{break}They're super useful for colouring metal.{break}{mood:happy}They're hard to come by, but Gaiana tells me you're great with plants!

{mood:like}I made the Great Spirit something that I know *I* would love, if I was a big giant god.{break}{mood:happy}It's a hammer that's hollow on the inside, so you can store soup in it! AMAZING WORK, FERRA.{break}{mood:like}I know, I'm irresistible. Wanna spend the festival with the most genius person on Moonstone Island, AKA me?
Summer is my faaaavourite season.{break}{mood:happy}Everyone starts getting their legs out.{break}I'm a legs kinda gal.

{npc:up}The hot spring at night is SO beautiful.{break}Especially when your eyes adjust to the dark...{break}{mood:like}And then you can see all the stars.{break}{npc:left}Zed told me that the stars are so far away that we're seeing their past selves.{break}{mood:default}I think that's romantic. And tragic.{break}Some of them could have exploded, and we wouldn't know for years.{break}{mood:sad}They just died out there, all alone. Unmourned.{break}{mood:laugh}Do you think I'm being melodramatic?
{mood:dislike}Rain makes my job so hard.{break}It's hard to keep a forge happy in wet weather.
{mood:like}Wow, that's quite the bedhead you have today.{break}{mood:happy}Have you been... up to something?
{mood:happy}One day, I'm gonna catch a meteor and make a COOL-ASS SWORD with it.{break}Wanna watch the show with your favourite Ferra?
What were the people like on your home island?{break}{mood:happy}Were they super hot?
I think you need a therapist.
Oh, Ossono and I were just talking about...{break}{mood:happy}Teehee. Never mind!

{mood:laugh}Oh, I'm glad you think so.{break}{mood:like}We don't really have any wordsy creatives on Moonstone Island.{break}{mood:happy}Although I like to think blacksmithing is a bit like poetry!{break}{mood:like}The music in the hammer strikes, the rhythm of the shaping...{break}It's like a song.{break}{mood:happy}Sometimes, I make up lyrics, too.{break}{mood:like}In other news, I'm too cold on the top and too warm on the bottom.{break}Let's get out and dry off!
Let me know if you ever want to spar with me.{break}{mood:happy}I've beaten everyone else in town! I need new competition!

{mood:laugh}Ha, you think so?{break}{mood:happy}Works for me. I've always wanted someone who appreciated my weird stuff.{break}{mood:like}You know, we don't have a lot of wordsy folk on Moonstone Island.{break}Cleo does a lot of academic writing, but honestly, it's a bit dry.{break}{mood:happy}And sometimes I make up songs in the workshop! Although that doesn't really count.{break}{mood:like}Anyway, I'm getting too cold. And too warm.{break}Let's get out and dry off!
{mood:happy}I cooked my thing in the forge. It's totally *meant* to be charred.
If I were mayor of the world, I would ban spherical objects.{break}{mood:dislike}Stupid round slippery things. Bah.

Eh, maybe.{break}But I'm just being honest.{break}I'm alone a lot of the time. I think about stuff like this.{break}Now you're here, I'm just sharing it with you.{break}It's getting a bit cold, though.{break}Let's get out and dry off.
Okay, so you know the coffee cup spirit?{break}Is it full of actual coffee?{break}{mood:awkward}Ugh, I can't imagine drinking it. Yuck.{break}{mood:laugh}Your job is so weird.
{mood:dislike}It's too hot.{break}You'd think I'd be good with heat from working in a forge.{break}{mood:laugh}I don't mind the forge heat! It's the sun that bothers me.

{npc:up}There are so many islands out there. Ones I've never even seen.{break}Doesn't it make you feel so... insignificant?{break}We're just tiny, tiny blips of life in this massive universe.{break}{mood:sad}In the noise of it all... we just don't matter.
